info.name: gamma flash
info.description:
R,B,G gamma fitted (use mouse) when no longer blinking and all same-color bars merge
fat bars = 2 vs 2.5 .    target sRGB = 2.2

Blinking color might be biased by "too smart" LCD regulators.

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u) {
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, 
         U = u/R, V = 3.*U, F = fract(V); 
    int c = int(V);                                // band id
    vec4 T = texture(iChannel0,U-U);               // cursors value
    O += step(length(u-vec2((float(c)+.5)/3.,T[c])*R),10.) -O; // draw cursors
    
    if (min(fract(V*5.),F).y > 15./R.y)            // else black line
        O[c] += (iFrame%2==0 || F.x>.2 && F.x<.3 ) && !(F.x>.1 && F.x<.2)                    
            ?  pow(.5,1./(1.5+1.5*T[c]))           // value^gamma
            :  mod(u.x+u.y,2.);                    // checker
}
